text: We are experiencing a bug where choice fields that control the displaying of other fields are not effective when they are within a repeatable field group. It works fine in the preview but the proper fields are not updated/exposed in the designer when the module is added to a page. The image above is the simplest way I could demonstrate the error I am talking about. The image and text fields would be dependent on the selection of a radio choice field with an option for each and the field group would be repeatable.
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
Lol - I literally just posted the same thing over in <#C2YH119N2|hubl> <@UAJ6S71L6>
Worked for me like 5 days ago
Ah! My bad, I should have searched a little harder. I'm glad to know I'm not alone here though.
No worries, I literally posted it 20 min ago
Hi <@UAJ6S71L6> <@U4RP6AGV9> I recently pushed some code related to something else that did indeed affect display conditions within repeating groups. Working on a fix as we speak, should be up soon!
Thanks <@U7P6G42AX> - Can't slip anything past this dev community :X
